name: LaserBurst
description:
Survive as long as you can by collecting items and killing enemies! Surviving and killed enemies give you points, how much depends on the type of enemy. (More coming soon!)

Controls:

Mouse to move

LMB to shoot

Backspace/ESC to pause

R to restart

This is my first game that might actually be worth playing, I hope you have fun!

Note: There may be stuttering when (re)starting the main game. I'm looking into it.
